title: Alright riot, I've got a problem with you.
body:
So the KD/A skins just came out, and oh my golly gosh! they. are. cute!!!!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  My adorable wife akali gets to be a popstar and live out her kpop dream :3 She has a new hairdo and a cute new outfit omggg. I get soooo dreamy looking at her {{sticker:sg-lux}} and im so proud of my cute wife for making in the industry with her friends~! 

but HOLD IT riot, whats up with ahri joining the gang?? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} i actually facepalmed when i saw this hussy in her getup like how is she allowed to be in this group? shes ruining the vibes of my pure wife akali who is an ANGEL by the way not a skank like that catty woman. {{sticker:sg-shisa}} this has ticked me off so much and i;ve tried to control my rage but i cant anymore. someone get riot in here so they can give my pretty wife a solo career away from these other harlots >:(((

replies.body:
K/DA Ahri is just the worst, UH! GOD! 

IT ACTUALLY MAKES ME SO ANGRY!

HAHA LOOK WE DID IT AGAIN! WE MADE IT AGAIN! ANOTHER AHRI SKIN! AHAHHAHA COME ON WEEBS BUY IT PLEASE!!!

FCUKING RIOT SCUMBAGFS AHRI ISN'T JUST A TERRIBLE PERSON BUT A TERRIBLE KIT AND JUST A WASTER OF AIR HONESTLY!

now, Evelynn on the other hand... NOW THAT'S A CHAMP!

{{sticker:sg-lux}} {{sticker:sg-lux}} {{sticker:sg-lux}}

Ahri is in the gang because her solo career (Popstar Ahri) was a complete failure, and she needs other singers to boost her standings in the musical world.

But, yes, she's a drawback. You can tell in the interview that the goddess Eve is annoyed that she has to translate everything that comes out of that fox's mouth...
